Templates

Templates are .html files used as email templates for sending notifications. Template files are uploaded in a directory for each project and those templates are available to be selected when creating notifications.

Creating a Template To create a template, click on the Templates button..

Enter the name of the template in the Filename field without the .html extension since it will be automatically added when saving the file (special characters are not accepted). Then, edit the content of the template using the WYSIWYG Html Editor.

  • Upload: Click on this button to upload a file from your computer to the current server.
  • Delete: Click on this button to delete the template. A message box opens to ask if the template should be deleted. Click on NO to close the message box and return to the Template list without deleting the template. Click on Yes to delete the template and a message will be shown confirming the deletion of the template.
